short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for salesforce administrators and developers to help them switch to classic mode without any hassle in a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An accessibility tool designed for Salesforce administrators, developers, and users to effortlessly switch to Classic mode with just a single click. This tool provides a seamless experience similar to the “Switch to Lightning” feature, allowing users to toggle the record detail page from Lightning view to Classic view instantly. 

Enjoy a hassle-free transition between interfaces, enhancing your Salesforce usability and productivity with a single click.
